name: Singularity Pursuit
description:
My name is Saul. At the time I am posting this, I am 16 years old and starting my Junior year of high school. This is my first game! It was developed over a period of two-ish months during which I had feedback from the wonderful people at the Indie Game Collective in Boston. I couldn't have done this game nearly as well without them, so my thanks go out to them!

Contact me!

Twitter: @Legorox


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please feel free to take this game for free. I don't expect any money from this, so take it! Just have fun with it! But if you're feeling way too generous, go and pay something. That's okay, too.

Also, I have always had troubles exporting to Mac, so I'm keeping this game as PC only for now. Sorry!

Finally, this is my first game. I know it could be a lot better. And there will definitely be bugs. But honestly, I probably won't fix them. I have a second game to develop, right?

Thanks for looking at my game!
